why-coredna.title: Hate tech? Love results? Core dna has you covered.
why-coredna.content:
Get started

No Code, Big Wins
Hate tech? Love results?
Core dna has you covered.

Focus on growth, not the grind.
Cutting-edge digital solutions—
Websites, apps, and e-commerce.
Let’s build something extraordinary.
Your vision, our tech expertise.




Book a demo Let's talk
CONTENT, ECOMMERCE, AUTOMATION
The essential Core dna guide

Everything about our platform, packed into one must-have blueprint!

Download here
Let's end your tech struggles

We solve the challenges mid-sized businesses face—no tech team required.

Say bye to tech overwhelm: Save a life launched an LMS in —no coding, no stress. 
Say bye to disconnected systems: Clark rubber integrates 60 franchises in one eCommerce store. 
Say bye to slow growth: Frontier Touring powered Taylor Swift Era Tour ticket sales. 
Say bye to lack of support: YMCA Toronto team increase registration by 500% online.
More success stories
Everything you need, nothing you don’t
Fast setup, no learning curve: Go live in days, not months, with an intuitive platform anyone can use. 
Custom fit, no compromises: Tailor your digital presence to your exact needs, not the other way around. 
Future-proof flexibility: Add new features or markets as you grow, without starting over. 
Managed services, no stress: Our team sets up and maintains your platform. No more tech headaches.
Innovative and global brands


Trust Core dna to power their digital presence with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled support.

Why they chose Core dna?

They found a partner, not just a platform to drive their success.

One platform to power it all: eCommerce, content management, and automation tools in one place.
No tech skills needed: Build your online store and manage content without ever touching code.
Scales with you: Grows seamlessly as your business does—no plugins or updates required.
We put SERVICE back in SaaS:  Our managed services give you access to our in-house team for all your tech needs. 
How we guarantee your success

A robust and reliable platform so you can focus on scaling your business, not managing the tech. 

Unmatched reliability

 99.9% uptime, 100% Lighthouse score, and global regulatory compliance keep your business running smoothly.

More about reliability 

Seamless scalability

Auto-scaling, global CDN, and multi-website hierarchy make managing large operations a breeze, under any load. 

More about infrastructure 

Blazing performance

Component-level caching, parallel processing, and a global CDN deliver lightning-fast experiences for your customers.

More about performance 

Secure connections

Industry-standard OAuth, two-factor authentication, and hundreds of prebuilt integrations protect and connect your systems.

See all integrations 
Client Words

“Expanded our business reach across partners marketplaces”

Leveraging Core dna’s headless capabilities to send product data seamlessly, Standard Process achieved:

Expanded reach with 86 marketplaces: Distributed product data across 86 online marketplaces, scaling online presence effortlessly.
One-and-done updates: Reduced workload by updating product info once to launch everywhere, saving hours of manual effort.
Faster market launches: Accelerated time-to-market with real-time data syncing, ensuring consistency across all channels.

Jeffrey Kirby

Solution & Enterprise Architect


“Core dna is key to our growth strategy”

By integrating 7 eCommerce sites with 30,000 product references using Core dna’s scalable solution, RANDYS Worldwide achieved:

Unified 7 sites with 30,000 products: Seamlessly connected 7 eCommerce platforms, managing 30,000 product references with precision.
Tailored search experience: Delivered highly specific search and filtering options to meet unique customer needs in the differential parts market.
4x revenue growth: Quadrupled revenue through improved site performance and customer

James Campbell-Harris
eCommerce manager 

Let's compare
Unified CMS & eCommerce
Headless Flexibility
Proactive partnership
Customization Power
Scalability built-In
Zero Transaction Fees
Rapid Onboarding
Enterprise-Grade Security
Frequently asked questions
How does Core dna continuously innovate?
What is multi-tenant architecture?
How does Core dna provide me with flexibility?
Do I need technical knowledge to use Core dna?
What differentiates Core dna from other CMS options?
What is a Digital Experience Platform (DXP)?
GET STARTED
Tailored solutions, expert support

Let's solve your tech challenges

Contact us Book a demo

Contact us

Transparent pricing

Our pricing is transparent with no hidden fees. Your costs grow in line with your growth.

Ready to start

All platforms come with pre-built applications and models to kickstart your project.

Continuous support & training

Our dedicated team will help with training, support and new innovation.

Get started today

Get access to your sandbox to see how Core dna can help your business scale.

Frequently asked questions
Is Core dna PCI Compliant?
Does Core dna limit the number of users who can access the platform?
What do I get for my subscription?
What is a server request?
If I go over my plan limit, will I be charged overages?
Is there a free trial?
Does Core dna charge transaction fees?
Are there any contracts?
Comparison table	Core dna	Cloud platforms	Legacy platforms
True multi-tenant architecture. Manage all properties from one dashboard		Not true multi-tenant	Not true multi-tenant
Access to all pre-built applications		Development or 3rd party plugin integration required	Development or 3rd party plugin integration required
Content, file storage and bandwidth		With limitations and additional charges	With limitations and additional charges
All system updates, new features and continuous integration		Not available	Not available
Pricing model	Fixed monthly charge. No upfront licensing	Licensing model and fixed fees. With a range of hidden hosting, development and support charges	Licensing model, with additional hosting, development and support charges
Transaction fees for eCommerce sales	None	Based on a % of online sales	Based on a % of online sales
Secure cloud infrastructure, with site backup, security testing, patching and all updates.		Additional charges	Additional charges
Content delivery network and load balancing		Additional charges	Additional charges
PCI DSS Certified – payment connectors		Additional charges	Additional charges
Performance monitoring, intrusion detection and reporting		Additional charges	Additional charges
Advanced SLAs		Partially offered	Offered with additional charges
Dedicated infrastructure		Additional charges	Additional charges
System audit, server and security dashboard		Partially offered	Additional charges
Developers	 	 	 
Advanced Templating support. 100% customizable, all solutions can be built using only front-end developers		With limitations	With limitations
API support		Partially supported	Partially supported
Templating Version control		Additional charges	Additional charges
Staging environments		Additional charges	Additional charges
Developer deployment environments		Additional charges	Additional charges
Advanced networking, support for Static IPs, reverse proxies		Additional charges	Additional charges
24/7 technical support		Additional charges	Additional charges
Training and consulting		Additional charges	Additional charges
GET IN TOUCH TODAY
Schedule a one-to-one consultation with your product specialist

Here’s what you can expect:

Walkthrough: An introduction of the Core dna platform
Analysis: Personalized recommendations based on your  business needs.
Case studies: How other businesses have used Core dna to scale more efficiently

features.title: Product Features
features.content:
Get started
FEATURES
Product Features

A collection of customer driven features that drive productivity and project speed. 

Core Content

A content platform your marketing and tech teams will never outgrow

Hybrid CMS

Support for both headless and traditional content management.  Create once and publish anywhere.

Composable Platform

 Create content that can be easily combined, reused, and repurposed across digital channels & experiences. 

Visual Page Builder

Easily create and edit pages with a drag-and-drop interface. No coding required.



AI Assistant

Create content, generate media and translate to over 100 languages. Scale your teams efforts.

Content Scheduling

Schedule content updates and publishing in advance. Set it and forget it.

Content Versioning

Track changes and revert to previous versions of your content. Never lose your work.

Multi-language Support

Deliver content in multiple languages for global audiences.

Content Permissions

Control access to content with granular user permissions. Keep content secure.

See all CMS features
Core Commerce

Remove the bottlenecks within legacy systems. Use the Core eCommerce platform to connect with your customers across channels and applications.

Product Catalog

Manage your products across multiple catalogs, variants, bundles, and more.

Shopping Cart

Provide a seamless shopping experience with a robust shopping cart. Boost conversions.

Checkout

Offer flexible checkout options like guest checkout. Reduce cart abandonment.

Payment Gateways

Accept payments securely with popular payment gateways. Get paid with ease.

Shipping & Tax

Configure shipping methods and tax rules. Deliver orders without hassle.

Promotions & Discounts

Run promotions with coupon codes and discounts. 

Order Management

Efficiently manage and fulfill customer orders. Manage returns.



Inventory Management

Track stock levels and get low inventory alerts. Avoid overselling.



Customer Accounts

Let customers create accounts to view order history. Build loyalty.



Product Reviews

Collect and display customer reviews and ratings. Establish social proof.

See all commerce features
Core Orchestration

Make it simple for your business to connect and automate tasks between and within web applications. A library of custom automations and workflows to save you time and boost efficiency without any technical know-how

Email Marketing

Send targeted email campaigns to the right audience. Engage customers.

Personalization

Dynamically personalize content for each visitor. Improve engagement.



Lead Capture Forms

Create forms to capture leads and grow your audience. Generate more leads.

Customer Segmentation

Segment customers based on behavior and attributes.

Workflow Automation

Automate repetitive tasks and multi-step processes. Save time and effort.

Transactional Emails

Send order confirmations and shipping updates. Keep customers informed.

A/B Testing

Test variations of content and designs. Optimize for best results.

Event Triggers

Trigger automated actions based on user behavior. React in real-time.

Analytics & Reporting

Gain insights from built-in analytics and reporting. Make data-driven decisions.

See all orchestration features
Core Integrations

Make it simple for your business to connect and automate tasks between and within web applications. A library of custom automations and workflows to save you time and boost efficiency without any technical know-how

SAP

Connect product data, pricing, and financials for end-to-end operational visibility.

Netsuite

Sync orders, inventory, and customer records directly into your enterprise workflow.

Microsoft Dynamics

Keep commerce and business operations in sync across departments.

Oracle ERP

Power complex business logic and enterprise integrations with secure two-way sync.

Salesforce

Sync customer data and behaviors to drive sales automation and reporting.

Hubspot

Automatically track leads, forms, and engagement for smarter nurturing. 

Cloud Platform

Never worry about infrastructure hosting, software updates, site speed, uptime, capacity or security ever again

Flexible Content Models

Prebuilt content models and support for custom models to fast track your project

Cloud Hosting

Host on scalable and secure cloud infrastructure. Ensure high performance across the globe.

Multisite Management

Manage multiple websites from a single dashboard. Streamline site administration.



User Management

Manage user roles, permissions, and access control. Keep your site secure.



API & Integrations

Integrate with third-party tools and services via API. Extend functionality.



Performance Optimization

Built-in caching and performance optimizations. Deliver fast page loads.

Security

Robust security features to protect your site and data. Stay safe and compliant.



Responsive Design

Create mobile-friendly, responsive sites out-of-the-box. Look great on any device.



Themes & Templates

Optional server-si
features.metaDescription: Core dna, the flexible and powerful digital experience platform that simplifies content management and eCommerce. Personalize customer engagement, streamline workflows, and drive conversions
